samples.question: And are you working or studying right now?

samples.question: Parents or teachers?
samples.transcript: I, I believe teachers are more fitted to help, to teach children because, with parents, I think there is the fact that there can be a sort of personal sense to how you see your children. samples.question: So where is your favorite place to meet your friends?
